subject: British Open (Golf)
John Deere Classic (Golf)
lead_paragraph: At 19, Jordan Spieth became the youngest PGA Tour winner in 82 years after winning the John Deere Classic. With the victory, Spieth became eligible to compete at Muirfield.
snippet: At 19, Jordan Spieth became the youngest PGA Tour winner in 82 years after winning the John Deere Classic. With the victory, Spieth became eligible to compete at Muirfield.
